answer
You are right! Let\'s go next step
You are wrong. Do it again

-2 points for each wrong question
If you look at the hint, you'll get -1 points (you'll continue to see it without deducting points afterwards).)
You can solve the problem later by pressing the button next time.
Enter your answer and press Submit to save your score temporarily
If the answer is wrong, it comes back to the question.
If you're ready, click Submit to complete the tutorial.
Tutorial
This is the hint section!
There\'s a snowstorm coming up!\nIt looks like fuel is in this basement for the duration of that blizzard, but it\'s locked.\nHow many times a large triangle is a small triangle?
a cellar lock
Why don\'t we turn the triangle inside 180 degrees?

I received a note from Camelot that seemed to suggest the location of the accommodation.
Couples face each other or sit next to each other.
* There is a couple 1 in the hallway.
* Next to the man in the hat is the wife of couple 3.
* Couple 2 is a position facing each other.
The wife of the remaining couple is the location of our house. Where is it?
Location and note of accommodation

First of all, the man wearing the hat is B.
+
C and F are men by all accounts, so the wife must be A.
+
Couple 1 will sit facing each other because it is an aisle seat. Since B is husband and wife 3, couple 2 becomes C and G.
+
So where are the rest of the couple? Provided quite a few hints!

After the expedition, they piled up their loot.
However, it seems that some group used a trick in the eye.
It's a structure that can't be placed in a container full of physical.
Which group cheated?
Find the culprit!
There is one design that is possible in two-dimensional paintings, but is not possible when you actually stack paper cups.\nLet\'s find it!

I can see a window with a curved design.\nIf a curved surface must be colored differently, how many colors would be required?\nYou can use the used color again as long as it is not on the side that touches it.
Window design
Let\'s mark the corners first.\nMost of the sides can be painted without any problems using only two colors.\nBut the fact that you need one more color on the lower left side!
Of these four boxes, the box with the picture No. 1 with the light and dark inverted is the box containing Kane\'s wallet.\nWhich box contained Kane\'s wallet?
Where is Kane\'s wallet?
Take a closer look at the handle of the locker, the trophy!\nIf you look closely, it\'s a little different!
Some weird little guy locked our accommodation!\nThe ratio of white to blue seems to be a clue.\nWhat\'s the password for this lock?
a wind-nosed lock

Let\'s think about the screws on the window frame.\nIf you draw a line horizontally and vertically based on the screw on the window frame, you can equalize the picture into 10.\nIt would be easier to think now.

If Camelot finds more than four people wearing red hats, he will give them high-end chocolate or special tickets.\nSome of the 10 people who participated received high-end chocolate, how many would some of them be?
Game of Camelot

Some said they received high-quality chocolate. In other words, there were more than four children wearing red hats.\n+\nIt also means that there are some participants who have not received it. If all the students were wearing red hats, everyone would have seen more than four participants wearing red hats.
hold off
hold off

One day, 12 residents gather to play board games.
There are six citizen cards and six villain cards mixed.
After designating himself as the first and excluding the sixth person several times, only six citizens remained.
Who started counting? The direction can be counted in only one direction.
So that only citizens remain
The first person to choose is one of the citizens.\nLet\'s count counterclockwise.\nThe first person to fall out is the villain in the 5 o\'clock direction.

There are eight chains of seven rings.
It costs a loaf of bread to open and close a ring.
Of course you need eight to connect eight places as shown, but there's actually a way to make it cheaper.
How much would it cost according to that method?
Roxy\'s necklace

The number of rings that make up one chain should be noted.
+
Miscalculated if you think you should only open both ends of the chain.
+
Pick one of the chains, open all the rings, and then connect the remaining seven chains.
Transfer the pancakes from the left plate to the red plate on the right.\nThey say you can move one pancake at a time, so let\'s move it well.
Moving Pancakes
Let\'s put the smallest pancake on a red plate and a medium pancake on a middle plate.\nAnd if you put the smallest pancake on a medium-sized pancake, you can put the largest pancake on a red plate.
Let\'s put the smallest pancake on a red plate and a medium pancake on a middle plate.\nAnd if you put the smallest pancake on a medium-sized pancake, you can put the largest pancake on a red plate.
a mysterious lottery
Will the more you pick, the lower the probability? Will it be high?\nLet\'s think of it as easy.

There is a box locked with two dials.
You can't turn the blue dial directly, but if you turn the red dial, it turns the same amount.
I turned it around a few times and it turned out to be like this.
How do I turn the red dial to get the blue dial back to the '3, 6, 4, 1'
Suspicious Dial Box
Red and blue dials are spinning the same amount, but one side is getting bigger and the other is getting smaller.

The receiver asks to bet on the appraised value of the necklace.\nEach gem has a different price, and if you cut three places, the emotional sum of the three lines is the same.\nWhere should I cut it?
The Jewelry of a receiver

First, let's add up the price of all the jewels. +

The value added to every gem is 7800. +

Since it has to be divided into three lines, the sum of each line will be 2600. +

Each of the three gems with a value of more than 1000 belongs to a different line. It is also placed at the end of each line. +

Now all you have to think about is which direction you're going to go further!

It seems that something that looks like a generator is locked with a door lock and cannot be used.\nI press it here and there, and the lamp next to it reacts.\nWhat is the password for this door lock?
an old door lock

Let's think about which numbers will be used first, leaving aside the places where they will be put. +

The first line shows that the four numbers are 4150. +

Among them, there are two numbers that fit the location, so let's think about it carefully.
roksi
kane
kamelot
bigboy
fungco
windy
tellia
ikinas
BACK
Enter your name in 7 characters
START
Game Title
SKIP
ENTER
%s survivla rank is
TeamProject

A severe cold of minus 40 degrees Celsius came, freezing the whole world.\nCivilizations all over the world were frozen hard by the freezing cold, and me and Kane, who survived, formed a group.\nBut we were almost out of supplies, and we had to do something to survive.
It\'s so cold. You\'re going to die!\nI\'m almost out of coal and almost all the firewood is wet, so I can\'t use it.\nWhat should I do?
If you stay like this, you\'ll freeze to death on the street.\nFirst, let\'s gather the resources around here as much as possible.\nAnd there may still be survivors here.
Yeah. I can see the town over there, so let\'s build a base over there.\nSince it\'s a village, it\'ll be much more stable than the street.\nAlso there will be things left to use.
We need to hurry up, I see a snowstorm coming in the distance!\nLet\'s go in and see. Let\'s go!
Kane and I ran towards a town with a chilly atmosphere.
Let\'s get ready for the snowstorm that\'s coming in the distance.\nEven if we\'re in town, it\'ll take a long time for that snowstorm to pass.\nWe\'ll survive no matter what happen.
Kane and I arrived at Sully Snowman Village together. \nI felt again that I was still alive when I saw the falling houses and many fuselages.\nKane and I entered a house and started a search.
Let\'s see... there\'s something I can use... \n(Searching closely inside the house with Kane)
Who are you! Where and how did you get in!\nJust the two of you? What\'s the purpose?

(It looks like she\'s the survived...)\nNo! We are not suspicious people. I\'m just here because there\'s a village in the distance.\nThere\'s a snowstorm coming from far away. We have to be prepared for that!

Snowstorm...! That\'s quite a big deal. I saw it at first glance and it took more than 30 minutes to pass by.\nAnyway, you guys seem to have survived, so avoid the snowstorm here first.\nCall me Roxy. I\'m sure you brought some firewood, huh?
We\'re just running out of firewood.\nIs there anything we can use here?
There was a hidden door on the floor. There might be something useful there.\nBut there\'s a lock for entering numbers. I think we should open this.
It\'s open! There\'s a coal box in here. Come on, get this thing up there!\nAnd hurry up and lock the door!\nIf there\'s any wind leakage, the house will sink down.
All right, Kane, put more boards on the window there!\nThe snowstorm is about to arrive!
(Snowstorm storms. The house is shaking with the momentum of leaving, but thanks to good preparation, it endured storm.\nFinally it seems to have overcome it well.)
It is over... We are over the biggest obstacle.
A snowstorm passed and we went to the town square. There were quite a few survivors there.\nI saw a man who seemed to be a leader, and I talked to him.
Hello, sir, there are quite a few survivors here in town. Is there anything we can do for you here?\nWhy don\'t we live here and survive together?
All right, the more people we have, the smoother the expedition will be.\nMy name is Camelot. I look forward to your kind cooperation.\nYou can live in the house with this note here.
I guess this is the house we\'re assigned to.\nThere\'s a housemate already.
Hi, my name is Big Boy.\nLet\'s survive together.
We are %s, Kane.\nGood to see you.
Now, let\'s explore the environment and collect resources that we can use.\nI\'ll give you these containers for each group, so please bring all the items that look useful.
(All the groups returned with five full barrels.)\nHow do we stack this up? I think I\'ve collected quite a lot.\nThis radio might be a big harvest.
All the trunks were arranged, and Camelot identified the capture that each trawler had been harvesting.
It is no shame that there are fewer snatches than others.\nBut if you inflate like this to look better than others, it causes trust problems.
It is said that sometimes they cheat like that to get more distribution than others.\nThose who cheated on their quotas are taken to the punishment room.
Trust is really important in a society that has barely survived.\nTrust is important while we\'re here, too.
Don\'t try to cover me up after doing something! (laugh)
Today, I went on an expedition to a new place. It is a little far from the village, where there is a large building.\nMe, Kane, and Roxy entered the building in groups.
When I see such a curved window, I miss it.\nIt reminds me of the past, you know what I\'m saying?
Oh, that\'s what you\'re thinking?\nSometimes I miss my normal daily life when nothing happens.
That\'s an interesting design.But it\'s not colored, so it\'s very plain. What about we color it like this?
There\'s such a loophole!\n %s, You have a good eye!
No, it just happened to be a hit! (laugh)
(...Don\'t you two are close strangely?)
It\'s already been a month since We\'ve been in distress.\nWe move the room to another one according to the rules.\nIt happened while I was moving my luggage to the new room I was assigned to.
Hey, Kane! What\'s all this, dude!
Damn, Kane has left all his luggage all over the place!\nThere are several boxes of luggage on the ground.\nRoxy, who just stopped by our accommodation, doesn\'t seem to understand the situation.
Hey, %s! Please help me!\nPlease help me find my wallet!
What\'s in there that\'s why you put everything in there!\nDid you pick up and hide some jewelry?
No! There must be a box with a wallet in these boxes.\nThere\'s an ID picture of my family in it!\nHelp me and I\'ll give you my dinner later!
Seriously... I\'ll help you. Open the box all!
I found it! It was in this box!
I\'m so glad I found it...\nWithout this, I have no reason to live.\nThank you so much for your help, %s!
But when are you going to move all these boxes?
Why? The sun is still up?
...Why don\'t you want to take a look outside now?
What\'s the problem? It\'s still around 8 p.m...
Is 8 p.m. day or night?
It\'s night... right...?
What should I do with you...
We found Kane\'s precious things and helped each other to move our luggage.\nBut the lock I saw for the first time was hung on the door of our room!
What the hack?\nI\'ve never locked a lock like this?
There was a kid who looked at us with a runny nose and a very simple gaze.
I hung it up! I picked up something interesting, but I was playing with it and got locked in it!\nPlease release that!
Who are you? You didn\'t know what a lock is?\nDo you know the password for this?
I\'m Fonco! I don\'t know how to touch that!\nRelease that, I wanna play with that more!
What\'s this picture? It was on this lock?
Oh, who\'s he? Do you know him?
I think he\'s just a kid.\nThere\'s nothing to worry about.
Anyway, let\'s pick the lock first.
I solved it! It\'s nothing.\nHere, take this.
Is that the one who was in this town?
Well? I haven\'t seen him in a month?
Who was he after all.\nI suddenly feel a chill in my spine.
Who was he after all. I suddenly feel a chill in my spine.Gather in front of building a to check the number of people and crops.\nThe harvest is more than I thought, so it\'s like a festival.
Great! The harvest is pretty big today.\nOn a day like this, it would be nice to do something fun!
Oh, I think Camelot is up to something funny.
I\'m happy to receive something, but... Do I really need this?\nI can\'t even drink it because it\'s frozen...
I arrived at the distribution center to get the food.\nI could see Bigboy already getting food rationed and going back.
Isn\'t that a Bigboy?
I think it\'s right. He\'s wearing a cap in a wired way.
He looked like a freak.
What? Why?
There are some rules for wearing a cap.\nI watched it carefully.
It\'s little bit wired, but isn\'t it like his own belief?
I think you\'re a nerd, too, analyzing things like that. (laugh)
Bigboy... Does he really like caps...
It seems like they\'re giving out specials today.\nGo with me, Kane, and Roxy and line up for rationing.
Guys! You must have been running for a special meal!\nYou should eat a lot because you\'re young!\nSolve this riddle and I\'ll only give you guys some extra milk and some sugar!
The pancakes were really delicious.\nKane stuck his nose in a plate and ate as if he were drinking pancakes.\nWhy I feel shameful?
Since a long time ago it\'s told that we\'re not playing with food.\nBut if there\'s a reward, it\'s a different story!
Your eyes turn around in front of the reward...
Oh! Won\'t they give me that pancake if I go back?\nIf you forgot our faces, you might give it to us again!
Come on...
After being served with Roxy and Kane, I went to the room because I had some time left until my work.
Ta-da! I gathered some ingredients to make a chain necklace!
Oh, it\'ll look good on you?
If you go to Bigboy, they\'ll put you in a chain!\nHe must be good with his hands.
Really? Then let\'s ask them to make it right away!
What do you think? Do you think it\'s well-made?
Yes! It suits you as expected!
I\'m surprised you connected it in a such way!\nI didn\'t think you\' I still don\'t know how you saved a loaf of bread.
One day, after all the work, the residents decided to gather and have a campfire.
Everyone, let\'s play a board game!\nI picked it up from the building over there!
Board games are good! Isn\'t that \'Avalon\'?\nI was really good at that long time ago!
Oh, if it\'s a game you knew, it shouldn\'t be unfair.
Then let\'s change the rules!
No way!! Then who the f**k is a Percival!!!
Hey, Kane, calm down. It\'s just a game (laugh)
It\'s so funny that he\'s playing the game seriously... (laugh)
Kane seems to be serious about winning... Why am I ashamed?
One day, I went on a quest with Roxy and Kane.\nI arrived at a building called Frozen Heart, and there was a strange merchant-like man.
Hey guys! I heard he wants to gamble! It\'s a bit unique!\nLet\'s try it!
Your eyes go round whenever who gives you anything, right?
Should we try it anyway!\nMaybe we can get something useful.
The man\'s face turned blue. Because the swallow left in the box was X.\nI\'ll quietly give you 20 coals, so I asked if you could just take this with you.\nNo, we took the risk and won.
I was about to enter the Ice Heart building, but the entrance was locked.\nNext to the entrance was a box with two dials.
I don\'t know why, but I feel like there\'s a key here to open this door...
Really? How do you know that?
If you look at it, it looks like it\'s going to happen...
Don\'t crave it too much, he\'s stupid, but nice one.
What! Who\'s stupid!
There was really a key in the box.\nI don\'t know why, who did this for what...
But when we were competing with guy earlier, it seemed like Fonco was going into this building.
...who is he sincerely?
While searching the Frozen Heart building, I found a jewelry necklace.\nI took this necklace and went to the thief to get an appraisal.
What do you think? How much do you think it\'s worth?
Well, that\'s a pretty good thing.\nHowever, I think we should pay differently for each gem.
Okay, please be objective and evaluate it!
Hmm... I\'ll make a bet.\nIf you get this question right, add more, and if you get it wrong, take it without opinion.
The thief handed the coin with a face of resentment.\nWho do you think we are!
Roxy comes running with a very flustered face!
What? Is something wrong?
Come with me. Come on! Come on!
We headed to the basement of the Frozen heart building.\nAn object, like a generator, was placed, and the repairman Ikenas looked around the object.
It looks like a generator?\nThere\'s a compartment down here where you can put some fuel or something like that.\nBut there\'s something like a lock here.
When I looked closely, it had a lock like a digital door lock.\nThis device seems to work only when this one is released.
There\'s a history of trying passwords next to this...\nI think there\'s some kind of rule.
Oh? I pressed this and the lamp turned on?\nIs there really some kind of rule?
Hmm... I think I know what it is? I\'ll try it.
The doorlock opened with a familiar melody.\nTemporary generators were activated with the roar, and electricity came to the ice heart building and the village!\nThe villagers cheered.
Hey, %s! How did you get this right? You\'re so smart!\nWhen I get back to town, can I report to Camelot this?
Everyone worked together, and most importantly, it was Roxy who discovered this!\nI was just helping.
You really solve everything...\nI\'m starting to get a little scared now. (laugh)
What are you? I don\'t think it\'s human intelligence!
At Kane\'s last word, everyone there laughed.
Camelot says he found me.\nI entered Camelot\'s room with a nervous heart.
Hey %s, that\'s you.\nThis was a great achievement.
No, sir.\nIt was possible because you took me and Kane to this town.
I believe you can lead my town after me.\nAn old man like me could stand down now.
No, I\'m still lacking a lot.\nBut if I have to succeed your role, I will.

Haha! What a great and polite guy.
I am so grateful that you have contributed to our community.
Take this paper and go to Telia.
Depending on the rank written there, your ration will vary.
I look forward to your continued support.
MENU
Details
Enter your name.
